titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2691) making appropriations for the Department of the Interior and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2004 and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-209, by Mr. Hastings (WA).
All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 85.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 319.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 199 (Roll no. 371).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 189 (Roll no. 372).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/16/2003--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2691 (FY 2004 Department of the Interior and related agencies appropriations).
